caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Respondent, v. ROBERT ANDERSON,

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Second Department.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Supreme Court, Queens County (Glass, J.).
opinion.opinion_text:
Ordered that the judgment is affirmed.
On appeal, the defendant argues that the jury verdict finding him guilty of unauthorized use of a vehicle was against the weight of the evidence. Upon the exercise of our factual review power (see, CPL 470.15 [5]), we find that the evidence adduced at trial clearly established that the defendant, knowing that he did not have the consent of the vehicle's owner, took the vehicle and operated it (see, Penal Law ยง 165.05). Mangano, J.P., Bracken, Lawrence and Spatt, JJ., concur.
